memberdef.name: REG_DOTALL
memberdef.initializer: 0x0010 /* NOT defined by POSIX; maps to PCRE_DOTALL */

memberdef.name: REG_UTF8
memberdef.initializer: 0x0040 /* NOT defined by POSIX; maps to PCRE_UTF8 */

memberdef.name: REG_STARTEND
memberdef.initializer: 0x0080 /* BSD feature: pass subject string by so,eo */

memberdef.name: REG_NOTEMPTY
memberdef.initializer: 0x0100 /* NOT defined by POSIX; maps to PCRE_NOTEMPTY */

memberdef.name: REG_UNGREEDY
memberdef.initializer: 0x0200 /* NOT defined by POSIX; maps to PCRE_UNGREEDY */

memberdef.name: REG_UCP
memberdef.initializer: 0x0400 /* NOT defined by POSIX; maps to PCRE_UCP */

memberdef.argsstring: (const regex_t *, const char *, size_t, regmatch_t *, int)
memberdef.name: regexec
